question.title: SAML 2.0 Single logout with pac4j library in java application
question.body:
I am using SAML 2.0 and trying to perform single logout using pac4j library in my java application without using spring security and I am currently new to this and donâ€™t know how to proceed, so if anyone can share some solutions or what needed to be done?

I tried to call methods given by pac4j for logout but nothing happens. IDP session remains active.
